name: Yuyuko's Sushi Track
description:
Background

Another year, another flower-viewing party. This time, the kappa decided to test out their new invention - the sushi conveyor belt!

Yuyuko being Yuyuko, she decided to put her mouth at the end of the conveyor belt to catch all the sushi. Suika, however, thought that the conveyor belt was some sort of slip and slide. Because she was drunk as heck, she didn't notice Yuyuko's gaping mouth at the end of the conveyor belt before splitting herself into a million smaller Suikas and riding the conveyor belt.

Oh, and Youmu got peer pressured by Yuyuko to join her.

How to Play

Use the left mouse button to knock away Suika and ocassionally tiny Suikas that rest on the sushi!

Don't let Yuyuko (or Youmu) accidentally swallow an oni!

Credits

Art: mostly me (except for the background picture, that was generated by DeepAI's image generator on deepai.org)

Music: me

Sound effects: 

  • https://otologic.jp/free/se/motion-eating01.html
  • https://soundeffect-lab.info/sound/various/various2.html
